articles.title: Bruins’ Fraser Minten is starting to see his stock rise in Marco Sturm’s system
articles.description:
“His jump, his speed through the middle — he’s kind of picked it up for a while now."

The post Bruins’ Fraser Minten is starting to see his stock rise in Marco Sturm’s system appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Fraser Minten's performance is improving under coach Marco Sturm's system.
Minten's speed and jump have noticeably increased, enhancing his game.
Local fans can expect more exciting plays from Minten this season.

articles.title: All the new movies and TV shows streaming in November
articles.description:
A full list of what to watch on Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, HBO Max, Disney+, Paramount+, Apple TV, and Peacock in November 2025.

The post All the new movies and TV shows streaming in November appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: November 2025 brings new releases on major streaming platforms for Boston residents.
Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+ will feature over 50 new titles this month.
Local viewers can enjoy fresh content during the holiday season, enhancing entertainment options.

articles.title: Irish police got a call about a lion. It was actually a dog named Mouse.
articles.description:
A truck driver’s grainy video spurred bewilderment and speculation about a lion roaming in Ireland. Turns out it was a dog with an aggressive haircut.

The post Irish police got a call about a lion. It was actually a dog named Mouse. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Irish police received reports of a lion sighting, causing public concern.
The 'lion' was identified as a dog named Mouse with an unusual haircut.
This incident highlights the importance of accurate reporting in community safety.

articles.title: Tom Brady refuses to pick sides in Patriots Buccaneers matchup
articles.description:
"Just... don't ask me to pick any sides here."

The post Tom Brady refuses to pick sides in Patriots Buccaneers matchup appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tom Brady declined to choose between the Patriots and Buccaneers for their upcoming game.
Brady's comments came during a press event on November 5, 2025.
Boston fans remain divided as both teams prepare for the highly anticipated matchup.

articles.title: South Shore woman loses over $30,000 in arrest warrant scam
articles.description:
“Please spread the word with your family and friends that sheriff’s office and local police do not make calls like this.”

The post South Shore woman loses over $30,000 in arrest warrant scam appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: South Shore woman fell victim to an arrest warrant scam, losing over $30,000.
Local authorities warn residents that sheriff's office does not make such calls.
Residents urged to share information to prevent similar scams in the community.

articles.title: 29-year-old driver killed in crash that closed Route 1 Wednesday morning
articles.description:
Another driver was taken to a hospital.

The post 29-year-old driver killed in crash that closed Route 1 Wednesday morning appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: 29-year-old driver killed in crash on Route 1 Wednesday morning.
Another driver hospitalized following the incident, details on condition not disclosed.
Route 1 closure caused significant traffic delays for Boston commuters.
